English:
That was... That was the Ghost of the Pale Boy
that we saw earlier!
Chinese:
喂，剛才那是……
之前看到的「白色少年的幽靈」！？
Korean:
야, 방금 그거…
저번에 봤던「하얀 소년의 유령」이었지!?
German: Das war ... wieder der Geist des bleichen Jungen!

English:
So if the previous pattern holds...
That Bakemon must be nearby, right?
Chinese:
按照之前的模式來看……
那個怪物就在附近了吧？
Korean:
그렇다는 건 저번 패턴을 생각해 보면…
근처에 그 괴물이 있는 거 아니야?
German:
Wenn das Muster also eingehalten wird ...
Ist der Verschlinger in der Nähe, richtig?

English: Hey! Hey, what are you guys doing?
German: He! He, was macht ihr denn da?

English:
Um... W-We thought if we followed you we'd find
the exit...
Chinese:
呃……我們以為只要跟著你們，
就可以到出口……
Korean:
에… 너, 너희들을 따라가면
출구까지 갈 수 있지 않을까 해서…
German:
Äh ... Wir dachten, wenn wir euch nachlaufen,
finden wir den Ausgang ...

English:
I already told you! I don't need a whole crew of
tagalongs following after me!
Chinese:
即便如此，
你也不要一直一直一直跟著我們好嗎！
Korean:
그렇다고 해서
그렇게 줄줄이 따라오지 말라고!
German:
Ich hab’s euch doch schon gesagt! Ich brauche
keinen Fanclub, der mir hinterherrennt!

English:
Heh, just as I expected. Here it comes.
What?
Chinese:
嘿！如我所料……果然出現了。
嗯？
German:
Hehe, genau, wie ich es mir dachte. Da kommt er.
Äh, was?

English:
Hang on... Seriously? What is that thing doing?
!!!
German:
Moment ... Nicht im Ernst! Was macht er denn?
!!!
